channel.title: [Help] With Fishing

item.title: [Help] With Fishing
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

case 383:
if (playerLevel[playerFishing] >= 60) {
if (misc.random(playerLevel[playerFishing] + 5) >= 25) {
success = true;
exp = 1000;
}
} else {
sM(“Your level is not high enough, you need level: 60.”);
}
break;

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] With Fishing
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Hey guys i’m currently making my fishing skill perfect on my server, but i’m having problems with this code. I can’t find where to put the level required to fish the certain fish. So if you can look over this that would help.

case 383:
if (misc.random(playerLevel[playerFishing] + 5) >= 25) {
success = true;
exp = 1000;
}
break;

That’s the code, the case 383 is the fish(shark)
And the exp = 1000 is the experience you get if you catch the shark. But i dont know about the rest. So if you can look it over and help me out with it. Thank You!!

Read full topic
